channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: L’Oled va-t-il supplanter le LCD sur PC ? Les chiffres de ventes impressionnants dévoilés pour 2025
item.description: Le cabinet d'analyse TrendForce révèle que les expéditions de moniteurs OLED ont littéralement explosé pour le dernier trimestre, avec une hausse de 65% enregistrée par rapport à l'année dernière sur la même période.

item.title: Cdiscount pratique des prix bien bas pour le pré-Black Friday : voici les 16 meilleurs deals
item.description: Comme bien d’autres e-commerçants, Cdiscount propose une foule d’offres intéressantes durant le pré-Black Friday. Téléviseurs, PC portables, consoles de jeux… Certains produits très demandés bénéficient ainsi de promotions inédites. Voici les 16 meilleures offres.

item.title: The next Xbox Partner Preview has been announced, and it's set to offer a brand new look at some of our most anticipated games, including 007 First Light and Tides of Annihilation
item.description: Microsoft has announced that its next Xbox Partner Preview will air this week and feature a brand new look at some of its upcoming games.

item.title: Sony is taking $100 off its PS5 consoles for Black Friday
item.description: Sony is cutting the price of its PS5 consoles by $100 for Black Friday. Deals include a PS5 Digital Edition 825GB Fortnite bundle for $399.99 and a 1TB PS5 Fortnite bundle for $449.99 — both ship with exclusive Fortnite in-game content and 1,000 V-Bucks. While the Fortnite bundles shave $100 off the regular price of […]

item.title: 15 Best Office Chairs of 2025— I’ve Tested Nearly 60 to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: X could soon show if you're using a VPN − here's all we know
item.description: X plans to display more information about users' accounts in a bid to fight trolls plaguing the platform − and VPN users could also be affected. Here's all we know.

item.title: A massive Cloudflare outage is affecting X, ChatGPT, and even Downdetector
item.description: Cloudflare, a networking company that provides DDoS protection and delivery services for many companies around the globe, is experiencing a major outage that’s taking down sites across the web. Users are running into an error message when they try to access X, ChatGPT, and even the outage-tracking website DownDetector has an error message saying “Please […]...

item.title: Nintendo’s two best releases of 2025 are now available as part of an unbeatable Black Friday deal
item.description: Get a Nintendo Switch 2 bundle that includes Mario Kart World, and Game of the Year nominated Donkey Kong Bananza at a hefty Black Friday discount.

item.title: Sennheiser has dropped the price of the brilliant HD 550s to a record low in the UK – and there's a sizeable US discount too
item.description: Forget Black Friday, upgrade your gaming audio today with a lowest-ever price on the headphones that made me ditch my gaming headsets this year.

item.title: Une grande partie d’Internet est en panne : que se passe-t-il ?
item.description: De nombreux internautes constatent des problèmes d'accès sur des services comme X(Twitter) ou des sites liés à Cloudflare. Une panne est en cours.

item.title: Bulletproof hosting service shut down in massive police sting
item.description: More than 250 servers were seized but no arrests were made.

item.title: Verizon vs T-Mobile: which carrier has the best Black Friday iPhone deal right now?
item.description: Verizon and T-Mobile have both released early Black Friday iPhone deals - both of which are potentially good (and potentially expensive).

item.title: MG présente sa nouvelle voiture électrique : un SUV familial pour se battre contre le Tesla Model Y
item.description: MG vient de présenter sa nouvelle voiture électrique : le S6 EV. Ce SUV familial remplace le Marvel R et chapeaute la gamme, en offrant notamment un grand coffre et une présentation plus premium.

item.title: VPN news live - the latest on cybersecurity, digital rights, and online privacy
item.description: Real-time updates, exclusive deals and expert analysis from the VPN industry

item.title: Les montres Garmin font le plein de nouveauté avec cette mise à jour majeure
item.description: Garmin a annoncé l'arrivée de sa mise à jour de novembre 2025 pour ses montres et ses compteurs vélo GPS. Au programme, un nouveau statut de santé, une meilleure gestion des notifications et des fonctions vélo avancées.

item.title: 14 Best Fitness Trackers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re skiing in the backcountry or trampolining in the backyard, we have an activity tracker for you.

item.title: Steam Machine and Steam Frame: your questions answered
item.description: Valve is making a game console that might take on Sony and Microsoft. It's also making a gaming headset to compete with Meta. These are big, ambitious, and messy efforts, and we have lots of questions. So do you! We've gotten a lot of questions about Valve's huge 2026 hardware push and entry into the […]

item.title: Talking to Windows’ Copilot AI makes a computer feel incompetent
item.description: It's not hard to understand the AI future Microsoft is betting billions on - a world where computers understand what you're saying and do things for you. It's right there in the ads for the latest Copilot PCs, where people cheerfully talk to their laptops and they talk back, answering questions in natural language and […]

item.title: Zigbee’s next big update lets you add smart home devices without a hub
item.description: The Connectivity Standards Alliance has released Zigbee 4.0, an updated version of its wireless mesh networking standard with better security, improved battery life, and batch setup of new devices like smart lights, switches, and plugs. It’s also announcing a new feature called Suzi, which is short for Sub-GHz and Zigbee. While Zigbee smart home devices […]...

item.title: Intuit signs $100M+ deal with OpenAI to bring its apps to ChatGPT
item.description: Intuit said its tools, such as TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks and Mailchimp, will be accessible through ChatGPT, allowing users to ask questions and complete tasks such as estimating tax refunds, reviewing credit options, or managing business finances.

item.title: ChatGPT Free vs Paid: will upgrading actually improve your experience?
item.description: You can use ChatGPT for free, but depending on how much you want to use it, it could be time to upgrade to a paid-for version.

item.title: The phone I’d buy my parents is a bargain in this early Black Friday deal
item.description: If I were buying a new phone for my folks, it’d be the Samsung Galaxy A36 – and you can save a cool $100 on this mid-range Android in this pre-Black Friday deal.

item.title: The Game Awards 2025 nominees are now live with Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 leading the show in 12 categories, along with Hades 2 and Hollow Knight: Silksong – here's the list and how to vote
item.description: The Game Awards 2025 nominations have been announced, and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 dominates the categories as the most-nominated game in the show's history.

item.description: We found lots of math-filled and science-rich toys for tiny nerds to assemble, bake, squish—or even tear apart and rebuild.

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures cartes graphiques en novembre 2025 ? Le comparatif des GPU
item.description: La carte graphique (GPU) est un élément essentiel de tout bon PC gamer. Face à un marché en perpétuelle évolution, avec des générations de GPU qui s’enchaînent et des technologies qui progressent sans cesse, il peut être difficile de s’y retrouver. Bienvenue sur notre guide sélectif qui vous aidera à choisir la carte graphique la plus pertinente selon votre budget. ...

item.title: La petite barre lumineuse Xiaomi pour écran PC est quasi à moitié prix pendant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Si vos yeux tirent la sonnette d’alarme à force de passer vos journées devant un écran, la Mi Monitor Light Bar pourrait bien devenir votre meilleur collègue. En pré-Black Friday, Xiaomi la propose à 29,99 euros au lieu de 59,99 euros, grâce à un coupon de réduction sur son site officiel.

item.title: Heinz goes all-in on Thanksgiving leftovers with squeezable turkey gravy
item.description: The condiment leader debuts a limited-edition Leftover Gravy bottle, inspired by millennial nostalgia and Thanksgiving rituals. Each year after Thanksgiving, people flock to TikTok to show off the elaborate sandwiches they build out of their holiday meal leftovers. The ritual, going strong for at least four years now, is often paired with a viral audio clip from the quintessential ’90s sitcom Friends describing the perfect sandwich made out of holiday leftovers. The sandwich, starring an extra slice of gravy-soaked bread in the middle, is known as “the moist maker.”...

item.title: 4 Clever Tricks That Make It Worth Switching to Proton Mail
item.description: Proton Mail is an appealing alternative to Gmail, Outlook, and Apple Mail. It also comes with advanced privacy and productivity features, including a way to manage newsletter overload.

item.title: DJI’s next action camera has an adjustable aperture for better low-light performance
item.description: After initially launching it exclusively in China last week, DJI has announced a global release (not including the US) for its new Osmo Action 6 action camera. The camera is not a radical departure from the physical design of last year’s model, but DJI is introducing some innovative new functionality. For example, it features an […]

item.title: Roblox will require age estimation to chat starting next year
item.description: Roblox will soon require that users go through an age estimation process if they want to be able to chat with other people on the platform. The requirement will be in effect for all users starting in early January. Roblox has come under significant scrutiny over child safety on the platform, with multiple states filing […]

item.title: Roblox will require all users to perform age-checks to access chat from January
item.description: Starting Tuesday, users can voluntarily undergo the age-check process to secure access to communication features.

item.description: DJI a présenté sa nouvelle action cam avec ouverture focale variable et capteur carré, la DJI Osmo Action 6.

item.title: Microsoft explains how Windows 11's AI agents will work as testing is about to start – and I'll admit, I'm nervous
item.description: Wondering how Windows 11's AI agents will work? Microsoft explains how 'agent workspaces' are lightweight and secure.

item.title: Voici EuroSuit, le prototype de combinaison spatiale conçu avec Décathlon que va tester Sophie Adenot
item.description: Elle s'appelle EuroSuit : cette toute nouvelle combinaison spatiale a été développée en partenariat avec le Cnes, mais aussi plusieurs acteurs dont Decathlon. L'année prochaine, l'astronaute française Sophie Adenot devrait la porter dans la Station spatiale internationale.
